Description: You have failed to conduct a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks from a dangerous substance, namely ethanol, that may arise from the presence of that substance on your premises at Mill Road Industrial Estate, Linlithgow and you have failed to identify the protective and preventive measures necessary to ensure that the risk can be eliminated or where this is not reasonably practicable controlled to a level that is as low as reasonably practicable and this substance presents a risk of fire and, or, explosion.
